channel.title: Drop Rates [PI]
channel.description:
I want to edit the drop rates and I am not sure where to do that. I think that it could be in this file. NPCDrops.tsm http://pastebin.com/8NwQMzR1
Or is this what it drops. Item Id:Amount If so where do I edit the drop rates of an item.

item.title: Drop Rates [PI]
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:4, topic:445450”]NPCDrops.cfg only has you drop items… NPCdrops.TMS is were you edit the drops

Example

#abyssal demon 1615:40 556:150 560:70 379:3 1373:1 1201:1 1618:2 562:50 1149:1 1319:1 1113:1 1147:1 1622:3 2364:3 1249:1 892:50 1247:1 1620:3 565:50 995:10000 1615:1 830:1 1185:1 563:50 1624:3 2366:1 4151:1

1615:40 - Npc and Drop rate of rare items
1st Line (After npc and drop rate) - just items the npc drops after kills
2nd Line - These items are drop 40% of the time… being about 50-60kills[/quote]
Why does one have 150 its 100 if you want it to drop everytime.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Rates [PI]
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

NPCDrops.cfg only has you drop items… NPCdrops.TMS is were you edit the drops

Example

#abyssal demon 1615:40 556:150 560:70 379:3 1373:1 1201:1 1618:2 562:50 1149:1 1319:1 1113:1 1147:1 1622:3 2364:3 1249:1 892:50 1247:1 1620:3 565:50 995:10000 1615:1 830:1 1185:1 563:50 1624:3 2366:1 4151:1

1615:40 - Npc and Drop rate of rare items
1st Line (After npc and drop rate) - just items the npc drops after kills
2nd Line - These items are drop 40% of the time… being about 50-60kills

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Rates [PI]
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

[quote=“infallibl3, post:2, topic:445450”]NPCDrops.cfg

the first number on a line is the npc id, every other number is its drops. more of one drop is a higher droprate…

example:

1, man, drops 995, coins, 1 third of the time, because it drops 100, (in my case, ranarr pots) twice as much as coins, and only drops 3 items.[/quote]
In my npc drop its just this 995:50000 it will drop 50k gp nothing after so were is the drop rate.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Rates [PI]
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

NPCDrops.cfg

the first number on a line is the npc id, every other number is its drops. more of one drop is a higher droprate…

example:

1, man, drops 995, coins, 1 third of the time, because it drops 100, (in my case, ranarr pots) twice as much as coins, and only drops 3 items.

Read full topic
